title: How 'Squid Game' Became a Megahit
description:
"Squid Game" is on track to become Netflix's biggest show ever. WSJ's Timothy Martin explains the show's origins and why Netflix has invested so heavily in Korean content.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
